flawed_nl_solution:
At the end of 2018, the tree will grow 100 x 1/10 = <<100*1/10=10>>10 meters more.
Thus, its height at the end of 2018 is 100 + 10 = <<100+10=105>>105 meters.
At the end of 2019, the tree will grow 105 x 1/10 = <<105*1/10=21/2>>21/2 meters more.
So, its height at the end of 2019 is 105 + 21/2 = <<105+21/2=231/2>>231/2 meters.
Therefore, the tree has grown 231/2 - 100 = <<231/2-100=31/2>>31/2 meters.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 110, not 105. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
